title: vaDivazhagan murugan
sahitya:
vaDivazhagan murugan (perum) varum aDiyavarkkellAm aruL viLangum kumaran


anupallavi

  piDiyil vElaiyum tan koDiyil sEvalaiyum paDaittu nirppAn ArupaDai vIDuDaiyavan


caraNam    parashivanukken mId-uruvAnAn ammai pArvatikkE selva maganAnAn
parandAmanukkE marudan AnAn mana kura magaL sura magaL patiyAnAn guhan
